questions.fr: As-tu déjà utilisé l'excuse "j'ai lag" pour justifier un whiff (raté complet) sur un ennemi immobile ?
questions.en: Have you ever used the excuse "I lagged" to justify a whiff (complete miss) on a stationary enemy?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà spammé le chat avec "EZ" (easy) après avoir gagné une partie serrée ?
questions.en: Have you ever spammed the chat with "EZ" (easy) after winning a close game?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà campé un angle pendant plus de 30 secondes avec un Operator sans bouger ?
questions.en: Have you ever camped an angle for more than 30 seconds with an Operator without moving?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà dit "je smurf" (je joue sur un compte secondaire) pour impressionner tes mates, même si c'était faux ?
questions.en: Have you ever said "I'm smurfing" (playing on a secondary account) to impress your teammates, even if it was false?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà dit "je vais clutch" et fini par mourir en 2 secondes ?
questions.en: Have you ever said "I'll clutch this" and ended up dying in 2 seconds?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà blâmé ton équipe pour une défaite alors que tu étais en bottom frag ?
questions.en: Have you ever blamed your team for a loss when you were at the bottom of the scoreboard?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà acheté un skin juste pour flex auprès des meufs ?
questions.en: Have you ever bought a skin for more than $50 just to flex in front of the girls?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà rage quit une partie ranked après avoir perdu le pistol round ?
questions.en: Have you ever rage quit a ranked game after losing the pistol round?

questions.fr: Ton aim routine dure plus d'une 1H30?
questions.en: Does your aim routine last more than 1 hour and 30 minutes?

questions.fr: As-tu déjà menti sur ton rank pour rejoindre un groupe de joueurs ?
questions.en: Have you ever lied about your rank to join a group of players?

questions.en: Been stuck in a rank for more than 6 months?

questions.fr: Es-tu resté bloqué dans un rank pendant plus d'un an ?
questions.en: Been stuck in a rank for more than a year?

questions.fr: Es-tu niveau 400 ou plus ?
questions.en: Over Level 400?

questions.en: Spent over $1,000 on skins?

questions.fr: As-tu manqué de respect lors d'un duel au couteau en 1v1 ?
questions.en: Disrespected a knife 1v1?

questions.en: Played Valorant every single day for a month?

questions.en: Played Valorant for more than 6 hours straight?

questions.en: Rage quitted a game?

questions.en: Screamed at your monitor while playing?

questions.en: Been muted by your teammates?

questions.en: Been chat or comm banned?

questions.en: Lost a friendship due to Valorant?

questions.en: Missed a major life event (wedding, funeral, etc) to play Valorant?

questions.en: Played while high?

questions.en: Cosplayed as a Valorant character?

questions.en: Got told you have a Valorant accent?

questions.en: Thrown a game on purpose?

questions.en: Cheated in Valorant?

questions.en: Placed a bet on a pro match?

questions.en: Gotten on a friends account to boost them?

questions.fr: Quelqu'un est-il allé sur ton compte pour te boost ?
questions.en: Had someone go on your account to boost you?

questions.en: Bought an alt account?

questions.en: Sold an account?

questions.en: Gifted a skin to someone?

questions.fr: Coche cette case si tu étais romantiquement attiré par cette personne
questions.en: Check this box if you were romantically attracted to that person.

questions.en: Faked your gender in a game?

questions.en: Was sexually attracted to someone's voice?

questions.en: Ever lied about your rank or achivements?

questions.en: Used tracker.gg to spy on someone?

questions.fr: As-tu stream snipe ou streamhack quelqu'un ?
questions.en: Stream sniped someone?

questions.en: Consistently an Odin, Judge, or Operator abuser?

questions.fr: As-tu T-bag un joueur ?
questions.en: T-bagged a player?

questions.en: Shot someone's body after you killed them?

questions.fr: As-tu pensé à ulter Brimstone sur une zone bondée IRL ?
questions.en: Have you ever thought about using a Brimstone ultimate in real life, in a very crowded place like a festival, a concert, or a protest?

questions.fr: As-tu aboyé ou miaulé à Sage/Skye pour un soin ?
questions.en: Barked or meowed at Sage/Skye for a heal?

questions.en: Acted annoying/loud in agent select to try and get someone to dodge?

questions.en: Have you ever turned around IRL to dodge a flash?

questions.en: Tried to jump or jiggle peek a corner IRL?

questions.en: Copied a pro's crosshair or settings?

questions.en: Is your main in Valorant Neon?

questions.en: Have you ever said "EZ" at the start of a match when the game wasn’t even close to being over?

questions.fr: Suite à cette partie, as-tu subi une remontada ?
questions.en: After that game, did you get reverse‑swept?
